info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:51PM CDT until June 12 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR JOHNSON COUNTY... At 951 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Godley, or 7 miles west of Joshua, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Burleson, Cleburne, Keene, Joshua, Alvarado, Venus, Godley, Cross Timber, Cleburne State Park, Lake Pat Cleburne, Cresson, Briaroaks, Coyote Flats, Egan and Lillian. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
